content: Loong Scales are one of the most important Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong. These Legendary scales are vital to finding some of the toughest hidden bosses in the game, and killing all the Loong dragons. By killing all the dragons, you will be able to unlock new Weapons and gear, alongside getting some of the rarer materials in the game like a Loong Pearl.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loong_Scales.md', within the main section titled 'Loong Scales'.
The content is as follows:
Loong Scales are one of the most important Key Items in Black Myth: Wukong. These Legendary scales are vital to finding some of the toughest hidden bosses in the game, and killing all the Loong dragons. By killing all the dragons, you will be able to unlock new Weapons and gear, alongside getting some of the rarer materials in the game like a Loong Pearl.
